00049 /**
00050  * Calcule le coeff d echange suivant la correlation de Shah
00051  */
00052 double Echange_contact_VDF_Plaque_Flux_Cte::calculer_coefficient_echange(int i)
00053 {
00054   double Nu;
00055 // double x_star;
00056 
00057   /*x_star = coord(i)-coord(0);
00058 
00059   if (x_star < 2e-4)
00060   {
00061   Nu = 1.49*pow(x_star,-0.3333);
00062   }
00063   else if (x_star > 1e-3)
00064   {
00065   Nu = 8.235+8.68*pow(1000*x_star,-0.506)*exp(-164*x_star);
00066   }
00067   else
00068   Nu = 1.49*pow(x_star,-0.3333)-0.4;
00069 // Re = fabs(getQh()*getDh()/getMu(i));
00070 // Pr = getMu(i)*getCp()/getLambda(i);
00071   */
00072   Nu = 8.24;
00073   return Nu*getLambda(i)/getDh();
00074 }

00078 double Echange_contact_VDF_Plaque_Flux_Cte::volume(double s, double d)
00079 {
00080   return s*0.25*d;
00081 }
